original_title: Rain interrupts play on day two of second Test
original_body_lines: Only 10 overs of play were possible before rain interrupted the morning session on day two of the second Test between Sri Lanka and Pakistan at the SSC ground.
The day's play began under overcast conditions, and play was possible for all of just 43 minutes
Pakistan added 33 runs to their score in those 10 povers, with the pair of Abdullah Shafique and Babar Azam extending their overnight partnership to 57. (Pix: Kushan Pathiraja)
